name: ROM
text: Dire Wraith Search — Action: Spend a [energy] resource and discard an ally in play → look at the top 5 cards of your deck. add X event to your hand (to a maximum of 3) where X is the number of printed health point of the ally (Limit once per round).

name: ROM
text: Setup: Find Leader of the Space Knight upgrade and put it into play. Help — Action: Choose a [[space knight]] ally in your discard pile and attach it facedown to Leader of the Space Knight upgrade (Limit once per round). “I offered my life to save Galador.” — ROM

name: Leader of the Space Knight
text: Permanent. Setup. Setup: Find Starshine, Pulsar and Terminator and attach them facedown to this card. Allies attached to this card may be played as if they were in your hand.

name: Starshine
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Starshine → choose a basic power. ROM gets +1 to that power until the end of the round (limit once per round). “The memory of my humanity is so strong that I forgot what I have become.”

name: Terminator
text: Response: After Terminator enters play, deal 2 damage to an enemy. “I enjoy their scream when I banish the Wraiths to the void.”

name: Pulsar
text: Response: After Pulsar enters play, remove 2 threat from a scheme. “Rom decided to stand against this horror, alone.” (Rom Annual #2)

name: Energy Analyser
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Energy Analyser → generate a [energy] resource for your "Dire Wraith Search" ability. “This analyser will reveal the creatures as they are.” —ROM

name: Neutralizer
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Neutralizer → generate a [physical] resource for an [[attack]] event. (2 resources for Neutralization event). “The analyser is replaced by the Neutralizer to send back the Wraiths to the void.” —ROM

name: Translator
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Translator → generate a [mental] resource for a [[thwart]] event. (2 resources for Assess the Threat event). “This analyser will reveal the creatures as they are.” —ROM

name: Plandanium Armor
text: You get +3 hit points and gain steady. “My armor can fulfill all my needs for 5 years.” —ROM

name: Rocket Pods
text: You gain the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action: Exhaust Rocket Pods → ready ROM. “Duty drives us.”

name: Brandy Clark
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Brandy Clark → choose 1 identity-specific card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck. “Why did you kill all these innocent people? I knew them since school...” (ROM I)

name: Steve Jackson
text: Interrupt : When ROM would be defeated by an attack, cancel all damage and draw 2 cards. Remove this card from the game. “So Brandy, you really believe all this robot is telling you? It's bullshit!"

name: Neutralization
text: Hero Action (attack): deal 4 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using only [physical] resources, deal 3 additional damage for each [physical] resource you overpaid for this card to a maximum of 6. "What Dire Wraiths fear the most is to be banished.

name: Assess the Threat
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using only [mental] resources, remove 2 additional threat for each [mental] resource you overpaid for this card to a maximum of 4.

name: Solar Charge
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 2 of that damage.
